comments: Better game than the other similar. I know the other game was first, but they want you to pay hundreds of dollars upfront so you start at similar pace as this one. Or wait long time, and span of that game is years! Whilst this game is fast to start, cheap, and at free play you can beat it in months, while if you spend a couple of bucks, you can beat it in days, at the most weeks. So basically they sell out this genre for a few bucks, and good riddance! It was fun for a few days, spend few bucks to beat it in few more days, or wait a bit. And thats that. It is, how it is suppose to be.

Tap your screen. Wait. Tap some more. Wait. Watch some ads and hope they don't freeze for a minute. More waiting. You're going to delete it eventually, just don't bother.  Reply: If real life were as banal and buggy as this game, I would have drunk a bleach smoothie by now.

EDITED REVIEW(new review first): game itself is pretty cool. There's nice bonus gifts that help get the game moving. Artwork is great. That ad with the voice over didnt do this game justice. Game gets 3 stars, ad gets 1. (ORIGINAL REVIEW) Saw an ad for this and must say it was awkward as heck. The voice over didnt seem like a real person or was too nervous to smoothly say the lines. Left an ill impression of the game at first glance. And while it did get my attention as ads are supposed to do, it's not a positive one.

Good game, but they're some bugs that need sorting out. At random times the game just cuts off, sometimes when you are loading up the game it say ooops something went wrong write an email, Evan some of the videos freeze up or just shuts everything down. I would be happy if I could play the game without any problems at all. Thank you for your time and patients. Have a good day.

descriptionHTML:
Cash is the name of the game in Cash, Inc. the ultimate cash clicker game! Tap your way to fame and fortune and you’ll become the most popular billionaire in this business adventure!

This tapping game was made for you, boss. Make money by tapping your way to the upper echelon. Tap to build one business, two businesses, three, and so much more! After all, a business tycoon has to start somewhere.

Click and tap all day and then let rich superstars take your biz to the next level! Become a money-crazed business tycoon as you see your riches grow.

The rich life lets you accumulate millions and billions of dollars while your workers do all the work for you. The adventure to fame starts now!

Cash, Inc. Features:

IDLE CLICKER THAT MAKES YOU RICH
• Tap, tap, tap and get rich while barely lifting a finger!
• Click and then rest. Profit from your businesses without actually being there!
• Tapping will make you a fortune. Use your earnings to invest in various businesses and then sell them to win the public’s sympathy!
• Make money and pile up profit so you can spend your money on what YOU want.

BUSINESS TYCOON AMENITIES:
• Click and tap upgrade your businesses and keep the money flowing!
• Make money while you renovate your business tower. More money means having better and more stunning tower appearances!
• The idle tycoon lifestyle means you get to manage profitable businesses while hanging out with superstars.
• Billionaire’s paradise: Lead a lazy, yet productive life while everyone takes care of you and your businesses!
• Hire celebrities and make more money while enjoying your fame!

SHARE YOUR WEALTH
• Make it rain money and brag about your riches on social media!
• Be a money machine and compare what you own against other business tycoons around the world.

Tap to keep your cash flow healthy and thriving as you continue building your business, fortune and reputation. Get famous and become the most successful business tycoon in this idle clicker game. Watch as the rich and famous fight for your favor in Cash, Inc.!

Download now to start your own business adventure to fame and fortune!

This game is an entertaining and super relaxing way to spend time. New pictures are added every day, and there is a large selection of different things to color. I really like this app, and think at deserves five stars. To whoever is making the art on this app, it is really beautiful. If you are reading my review, (Wich you probably aren't) I think it would be really cool if you did some pictures from popular books and movies.

In my humble opinion, this game is truly a work of art and talent. This game can be used by people of all skill levels, due to the variations of complexity and difficulty within each pixel art piece. And it's just bursting and overflowing with hundreds, maybe even thousands of art pieces. There are hours of fun and relaxation awaiting you, and what a way it is to pass the time. Even better, it is appropriate for ages of all kind, including small children.Overall, I recommend this to anyone willing, for this is truly glorious.

WOW, great memories came back. Amazing graphics, and story is going good so far. Only thing is the controles, I mean you should have given the original TEKKEN controls with the moves n all. Its now like a small kid can play. Their is no fun n pressure of making the right punch or through as the good old days. If you guys can make a lit like that, then its will more gold in a gold mine. Otherwise is a nice game.  Thank you

Samsung Galaxy S6... Alright, they went and fixed the release bug crashes within a day or two. I finally got to enjoy the game. It's pretty decent. I'm enjoying the whole fighting/build your characters concept. As promised, I've raised my rating. (Probably could give more on the post mission drops) other than that, I love how there isn't a limit to how many missions you can do and have to wait for an energy bar to replenish. Great game so far. (Give more on the drops though lol... seriously)

First off, the thought of the game and concept of direction it went in for a mobile game is fair, I'll give it that. But... I will say, being one of the best franchises ever created, I expected more. Not another knockoff style of Marvel and DC's (and MK's) style of fighting game. I expected originality from an original creator. The having to heal and near impossibility of play at a certain point (unless you pay a lot...) steered me away from it, tbh.

This game is beautiful! I have always loved Tekken ever since the 1st and have played them all. I only wish some of my favorite characters weren't missing, like Lei and Bryan and I haven't seen Yoshimitsu or Heihachi Mishima. Overall I am very impressed. Thanks, I have been waiting for this on Android for a long time! I would rate 4.5 stars ‚ò∫

So far I've been enjoying it. It's nothing too special, typical mobile fighting game but Tekken. The fact that's it Tekken makes it more enjoyable than average because I love Tekken, but that's just me. I feel that acquiring new characters needs to be way easier than it is, especially when you need to take on harder missions for bonus materials and currency. I don't like how you have to wait for characters health to regenerate. If characters healths auto filled per mission, I would definitely put more time into the game. Since it isn't, I have to constantly stop playing and wait for the health to refill, and I don't wait to use healing items because it takes away from my in game currency, which itself is difficult to obtain if you aren't constantly grinding. Aside from that, it's fun. Very fun, I recommend.

comments: There is just to much to say about this brilliant, creative, and fun game! It keeps me busy while im bored and on a road trip! I saw an ad for this on instagram and decided to download it, and let me tell you I was not disappointed with the outcome. I've been seraching for games like this and I have finally come across such a fantastic game! The Fluffy charectors should be sold as toys because of their adorable look!

I have just one piece of criticism... How is it that you're not selling these things as toys??? I want, like, all of them. For the love of God, make a Kickstarter if you must, but you need to make real Fluffies and sell them right now! The game's great, by the way, although I wish the Fluffy didn't cover the view so much, and I also wish the rainbow system thing was better explained, because I have no idea how it works. Keep it up!

It's interestingly successful. Im actually into the games with a good story or good music. Although this game contains neither Im actually loving it! The only comment that I would say is that I can't see much thing because of the fluffies are big, I usually mix coins or fire and avoid both :D

I love Fluffy Fall so much!! It is SUPER kawaii, fun, fuzzy, and enjoyable. It takes up your time as you try to beat your highscore!! Mine is 45.  I am really hoping that it updates, because I want all the monthly gem stones to be in stone section. I think it would be cool to have my gem stone. And play as it.  Anyways, I really love the game, it is so amazing!! If you love kawaii and fun games, get Fluffy Fall!!! üòäüíï

First of all, I was astonished by the graphics. It's simple to learn, and despite the lack of any instruction, I understood how to play immediately. It could honestly use a little more to do, long run, levels or other goals beyond what's already there, but for the time being it's a lot of fun.

Absolutely Love this! I've only been playing for at least an hour but it's so unbelievably adorable! I always try sticking with adventure games but any game with cute little puffblocks are always gonna be tested as well, I definitely recommend people of all ages to play üòÅ

descriptionHTML:
Dash headlong into an astonishingly fun (and incredibly cute) 3D endless-run adventure! Take on level after level as you fly your cuddly Fluffy through danger with just a finger. Dodge a blaze, snake around ice, go rolling past lasers and escape other crazy hazards that block your way.

The road is full of pitfalls, but it’s sure to pull you in.

Features:
• Amazing 3D animation meets accessible gameplay that’s popular with kids, but still has enough fast arcade action to give anyone a rush.
• Dodge screen-blurring ice blocks, escape flames and blaze past loads of other dangers that can harm your adorable Fluffy.
• Collect Gold to unlock more than 60 cool Fluffies and find the cute little puff that suits you the best.

The perfect game for rolling out to kids (yet still super addicting to adults) who enjoy the popular endless-run gameplay style and fast action!

comments: I freaking love this game but I do recommend more energy or at least less time to wait for energy. Please and thank you :)  P.S. We need more diamonds some how like. Maybe you should let us watch ads for 2-5 diamond's each ad. Or do a daily login type thing. I know you guys wont but I've been playing this game a ton and for a long time. i restart everything because when you guys make new stories it makes me want to use diamonds but I don't have anymore. I restarted the game like over 10 times honestly. Thanks for a great game though.

I never thought I would find a game like this that would work so well and play so easily! The only things I would change would be adding videos to gain more gems, or getting 2 gems after each chapter. Maybe even some extra gems after finishing a story? Getting gems on previously finished stories as well. I would also add the option to replay a chapter from the menu, not only after playing the chapter. Other than that, THIS GAME IS A MUST PLAY!

I really do love the stories this game offers. I just wish the key and diamond system was better. I feel like I've purposely passed up some great stories just to play through them quickly so I could get back to the current story I'm really hooked on. Not to mention I've put money into the game as well. But being on a budget, I'm limited with what I can do. Sadly I think that is what will eventually make me stop playing such a great game. It's just too expensive in the end.

I have fallen in love with this app and whoever created the stories is creative and amazing, however it would be nice if you could make it so we can earn more keys per time given and definitely make it so the good choices don't cost so many diamonds. Those two factors get really annoying and depressing. All the good choices cost way too many diamonds. Unless  you make it so we can earn more of those per chapter and let us earn free ones by watching adds or something. Otherwise, amazing game. Thanks.

Amazing! I love it but I absolutely HATE that you only get 1 key every 2 hours. And once you get 2 keys it stops giving you them. I love the freshman and I'm on chapter 11 but it will take me ages to finish all of them as the lack of keys you give. I think it should be 2 keys every 1 hour and the keys come non-stop. I will change my review to a 5 star if you consider and use some of these suggestions. Thank You.

I love this app! I just wish you could collect more than 2 keys at a time. Sometimes the chapters feel short and to only be able to accumulate 2 keys feels like its not enough. 3 to 5 would be way better! Its already a bummer to not have enough diamonds to unlock cool stuff. (unless you want to pay more.. Not everyone has money to spend on phone app games)
description: One choice can change everything! Fall in love, solve crimes, and embark on epic fantasy adventures in immersive visual stories where YOU control what happens next! Current stories include:THE FRESHMAN, BOOK 1. Welcome to Hartfeld University! You'll make friends for life, and maybe even find true love. Will you date bookish James, party girl Kaitlyn, football hero Chris... or all three at once?- Dress to impress with fashion forward outfits.- Choose a date for the elegant and romantic Winter Formal.- Support new friends as you tackle freshman adventures together!THE CROWN & THE FLAME, BOOK 1. Your enemies stole your kingdom, but now the time has come for you to raise an army, master magic, and reclaim your crown!- Form alliances to build your army.- Master unique weapons.- Choose between elegant ball gowns and powerful armor.- Crush your enemies in an epic battle!MOST WANTED, BOOK 1. The heat is on when a no-nonsense Texas Marshal and a Hollywood detective are thrown together to stop a deranged hitman. Can you catch the killer?- Play as Detective Dave Reyes and U.S. Marshal Sam Massey.- Investigate a mystery with twists you won't see coming.- Examine evidence at crime scenes.- Stop the killer before he can claim another victim!...PLUS more new stories COMING SOON!Choices is by the team that first created story games for mobile over a decade ago. Later we created Surviving High School and Cause of Death, the first games with episodes, for EA.Both games hit the Top 25 and were inspirations for other companies. After leaving EA, our team regrouped in a small office and with the quacking of nearby ducklings we set out to create story driven games with heart. As Pixelberry, we launched two hit games, High School Story and Hollywood U.Our team has now grown to over a dozen of the most experienced game writers in the industry. In our 10 years of creating story games together, we‚Äôve seen heartbreak, marriages, great adventures, and even Pixelbabies.But even through diaper changes and late nights, we think we‚Äôve created our best work to date. We hope you‚Äôll fall in love with our newest characters, Chris, James, Kaitlyn, Dave, and Sam just as we have.Enjoy,- The Pixelberry Team
descriptionHTML:
One choice can change everything! Fall in love, solve crimes, and embark on epic fantasy adventures in immersive visual stories where YOU control what happens next! Current stories include:


THE FRESHMAN, BOOK 1. Welcome to Hartfeld University! You'll make friends for life, and maybe even find true love. Will you date bookish James, party girl Kaitlyn, football hero Chris... or all three at once?

- Dress to impress with fashion forward outfits.
- Choose a date for the elegant and romantic Winter Formal.
- Support new friends as you tackle freshman adventures together!

THE CROWN & THE FLAME, BOOK 1. Your enemies stole your kingdom, but now the time has come for you to raise an army, master magic, and reclaim your crown!

- Form alliances to build your army.
- Master unique weapons.
- Choose between elegant ball gowns and powerful armor.
- Crush your enemies in an epic battle!

MOST WANTED, BOOK 1. The heat is on when a no-nonsense Texas Marshal and a Hollywood detective are thrown together to stop a deranged hitman. Can you catch the killer?

- Play as Detective Dave Reyes and U.S. Marshal Sam Massey.
- Investigate a mystery with twists you won't see coming.
- Examine evidence at crime scenes.
- Stop the killer before he can claim another victim!

...PLUS more new stories COMING SOON!

Choices is by the team that first created story games for mobile over a decade ago. Later we created Surviving High School and Cause of Death, the first games with episodes, for EA.

Both games hit the Top 25 and were inspirations for other companies. After leaving EA, our team regrouped in a small office and with the quacking of nearby ducklings we set out to create story driven games with heart. As Pixelberry, we launched two hit games, High School Story and Hollywood U.

Our team has now grown to over a dozen of the most experienced game writers in the industry. In our 10 years of creating story games together, we’ve seen heartbreak, marriages, great adventures, and even Pixelbabies.

But even through diaper changes and late nights, we think we’ve created our best work to date. We hope you’ll fall in love with our newest characters, Chris, James, Kaitlyn, Dave, and Sam just as we have.

Enjoy,

- The Pixelberry Team
developerAddress:
Pixelberry Studios
201 SAN ANTONIO CIR 205
MOUNTAIN VIEW, CA, 94040-1271, US
recentChanges: From science-fiction to supernatural romance to courtly intrigue, Choices is bringing brand new genres along with more of your favorites!
Thanks to all our players for your support! You make this all possible! And if you love Choices, let us know by leaving a FIVE-STAR REVIEW!
summary: Fall in love or go on adventures in stories where YOU control what happens!
title: Choices: Stories You Play

description: Bidding on storage auctions is a very good way to make money, if you‚Äôre not afraid to test your luck and instincts, that is. Go full high-stakes, outbid your rivals and turn a profit by selling your valuable acquisitions in your own pawn shop. You‚Äôll be rich and powerful in no time!HIGHLIGHTSüí∏PROFIT from your smart deals and unlock new buildings in town to expand your business and make even more money!üí∏OUTBID your competition in edge-of-your-seat storage auctions. Enjoy intense gameplay as you choose, analyze and bid faster than your rivals in auctions all over the world!üí∏RUN your own pawn shop and display your rare and valuable acquisitions. Make customers come from all over the world to spend money on your business and make you rich!üí∏LIVE through a gripping story with engaging characters on your quest to turn your rundown family business into a city-wide business empire!üí∏GET KNOWN in the auction world and be noticed by big names on the scene: you never know who might want to do business with you!üí∏COLLECT a wide range of exotic items, from rare antiques you can restore to cars and boats you can renovate and sell at an epic profit!Take part in every auction and don‚Äôt miss a single opportunity to bid: some of these musty old garages hide treasures beyond your wildest dreams! Try your luck, but never ignore your instincts: they can make or break a bidder‚Äôs career!Become a rising star as you take part in bigger auctions and deal with the good and bad attention you‚Äôll get: some big pawn shop moguls might not like the competition your business represents, and they‚Äôll pull out all the stops to hinder your path! Such problems come with the territory when you get rich and notorious, so be prepared to deal with it!Start your pawn empire now and get ready to bid!Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.
descriptionHTML:
Bidding on storage auctions is a very good way to make money, if you’re not afraid to test your luck and instincts, that is. Go full high-stakes, outbid your rivals and turn a profit by selling your valuable acquisitions in your own pawn shop. You’ll be rich and powerful in no time!

HIGHLIGHTS

💸PROFIT from your smart deals and unlock new buildings in town to expand your business and make even more money!

💸OUTBID your competition in edge-of-your-seat storage auctions. Enjoy intense gameplay as you choose, analyze and bid faster than your rivals in auctions all over the world!

💸RUN your own pawn shop and display your rare and valuable acquisitions. Make customers come from all over the world to spend money on your business and make you rich!

💸LIVE through a gripping story with engaging characters on your quest to turn your rundown family business into a city-wide business empire!

💸GET KNOWN in the auction world and be noticed by big names on the scene: you never know who might want to do business with you!

💸COLLECT a wide range of exotic items, from rare antiques you can restore to cars and boats you can renovate and sell at an epic profit!

Take part in every auction and don’t miss a single opportunity to bid: some of these musty old garages hide treasures beyond your wildest dreams! Try your luck, but never ignore your instincts: they can make or break a bidder’s career!

Become a rising star as you take part in bigger auctions and deal with the good and bad attention you’ll get: some big pawn shop moguls might not like the competition your business represents, and they’ll pull out all the stops to hinder your path! Such problems come with the territory when you get rich and notorious, so be prepared to deal with it!

Start your pawn empire now and get ready to bid!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

comments: Good game to pass your time. Upgrade costs and parts spawn rates are reasonable if you only use a few vehicles because it will take a long to yo max out everything. I think it will be better if league vs trophies distribution are reworked because its very easy yo reach legends. should give a higher win bonus at higher trophies i think to make it more competitive. And lastly, hackers should be deleted from leaderbord.. there are a few impossible timings on the board.

I enjoy the game greatly. It's slightly different with  the chest and stuff but it is sure nice to get bonuses every now and than. There are new adds though which I'm not super stoked about like the brake time adds but they keep them short and can be skipped quick if you have already watched them. All and all great game

I love this game. Every game I've had, I played for a week or so, and uninstalled. But this one? Ive had for almost 6 months. Been playing every single day. Finally reached legendary 32, I've unlocked everything. I love the VIP subscription and upgrades it gives you. I would like atleast one new vehicle option every month or so. Or at least a new adventure spot. Making a modded version of the rally car would be fantastic. Also, an upgrade on the formula car where it doesn't almost dead stop after it lands from a big air.

Superb game! Too bad, the elements of hate like to hack good things and cause frustrations. For this reason, constantly run constant updates. I wouldn't mind paying through my rather expensive data to diffuse the damage by these bored, small prick nincompoops! Africaüòùüòùüòù

Well done with stealing the boxes idea from clash royale wow you didn't even Change the opening times, I think the next thing you should do is offering legendary and epic chests with legendary and epic cars. I have loved the first part of this game it was funny and doesn't make any pressure on you, the second one should be blocked from play store, shame on you..

If you don't want to give away free stuff from the chests, don't. But stop wasting my damn giving me these "free" coins for watching a video only to have the ad freeze %95 of the time. The are plenty of other free games out there, might be time for a change.

comments: Easy to play.  Very addictive.  Game moves as fast, or as slow, as you do; the pace adapts well for both casual and serious players.  You can play on both your desktop and mobile interchangeably with the same account!  Developers are very much a part of the community; constantly improving the game and running in-game events.  While there are in-app purchases I never feel pressured... I spent a few $ because I wanted to support the game as I've been enjoying it throughly.

This is a great game. I have played it for over 2 years now and it's still my favorite game. Advice to newbies, take your time. Stay in one age and build up your resources before moving on. You can play in multiple worlds, join guilds, make friends and they have great quests to do if you choose to.

It is  great game, for ages 10 and up even 9 is okay. It is cool that we are building a town from scratch, like from the prehistoric time, and building our way up. Not like other game that start you off with big present day buildings. It doesn't cost a lot to do things like building and removing things, some object are free, they give the right amount of money and you can always win some more diamonds. In other games you would have to pay to remove object and buildings are ridiculously expensive.  It is hard to make money in other games and to make diamonds. I personally at night put my hunters too make things that take 8 hours and in the day things that take 5 to 15 minutes but sometimes 1hour. It is a very good game, it is almost as a real life city town, empire.

Very annoying problem with Google Play account disconnections at task swap. Fix this, and I will be able to actually play the game. Since I use my phone for making real income, I need to swap screens to other activities, and each time do a four step log in process back into the game. I have never seen this problem before in any other game, no reason this game would be different. Unfortunatly the problem seem to become worse, I would not spend money on this game, too shaky account control. Will uninstall it now and go shopping for something more reliable. A shame as the game itself is really neat.

This is a wonderful game, great effect and a wonderful story line. My only issue is logging in. I keep getting a message saying my internet connection is not working, yet with no internet connection I would not even get to the sign in page. Please fix this issue or I am done.

Boring!! Hurry up and wait. Never enough coins and forge points. Constantly waiting for buildings to make money and points. Ready made buildings. Can't build your own. Waiting, waiting, waiting. Been playing about 2 hours and already bored to death!
description: Come and play Forge of Empires! Take control over a city and become the leader of an aspiring kingdom. Guide it through the ages, research new technologies, expand your empire and live through an epic story. Battle other players and prove your skills as king and warlord.FEATURES- Build your city and evolve from the Stone Age to modern times (and beyond).- Develop new technologies and discover new buildings and goods- Produce supplies to manufacture goods- Exchange your goods and trade with your neighbors- Discover new territories and seize control of the provinces and their rewards- Use your negotiation or battle skills to take over sector by sectorForge of Empires is based on our successful browser strategy game which was published by InnoGames, developers of fantasy strategy game Elvenar, in the summer of 2012. Finally, the online strategy game is available for Android as well, providing cross-platform access. Forge of Empires is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in­app purchases in your device's settings. A network connection is also required.Imprint:	https://legal.innogames.com/portal/us/imprint
descriptionHTML:
Come and play Forge of Empires! Take control over a city and become the leader of an aspiring kingdom. Guide it through the ages, research new technologies, expand your empire and live through an epic story. Battle other players and prove your skills as king and warlord.

FEATURES

- Build your city and evolve from the Stone Age to modern times (and beyond).
- Develop new technologies and discover new buildings and goods
- Produce supplies to manufacture goods
- Exchange your goods and trade with your neighbors
- Discover new territories and seize control of the provinces and their rewards
- Use your negotiation or battle skills to take over sector by sector

Forge of Empires is based on our successful browser strategy game which was published by InnoGames, developers of fantasy strategy game Elvenar, in the summer of 2012. Finally, the online strategy game is available for Android as well, providing cross-platform access.

Forge of Empires is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in­app purchases in your device's settings. A network connection is also required.

comments: I love this game! If you like chess and like to think you'll like this game no doubt! There are some ads but not so much that it makes me want to turn off my Wi-Fi. It has cute graphics and runs smooth. I just cant get enough. As far as scary no not scary a little like whoa they're gunna hit.. Oh wait phew how did they not hit? RGB keep up the good work with this game and all your other free stuff! You guys make great games for all ages!

Im not normally one for puzzle games but This game is great and addictive, haven't played a game quite like it. This game was done so well from the gameplay to graphics to controls, it is a really fluid experience and a great puzzle game, the new mechanics were introduced perfectly as I progressed and there was never a puzzle too easy or hard the level of difficulty increases and a good rate! Way To Go guys

This is a phenomenal puzzle game. It provides you with an incredibly simple concept that eases the player into the game's mechanics and turns into some very devious puzzles later on. The ads are a bit intrusive, being the ones you could accidentally tap on trying to remove with larger hands (like mine), and unskippable video ads that reward you with in-game currency needed to unlock levels, but those are never necessary, and for less than 2 dollars you can remove them outright. All in all, this is a charming and brain-teasing puzzle game that's well worth your time.

The first levels are okay but after that there's a huge difficulty gap, got really frustrating. Controls are really bad. How I'm supposed to know where I'm taking the truck if my finger is on top of it?

I love this puzzle game to death. I can literally play it all day and never get tired. Thank you for the challenging ones, it gets my brain going and it makes the game more tense. I certainly am inlove with the music. Please put a soundtrack on youtube, I would love to listen to it !! Thank you creators of the game, I enjoy playing it so much, and I do hope that there's more.

I like it! Certain levels were so challenging to beat in Expert Mode I thought it was impossible. But with some patience you can solve it! (With the exception of Houston U-4 how do you beat that in 46 moves lol)
description: RGB Express is a unique and beautiful puzzle game. Simple to play, yet super addictive! You are running RGB Express, the one and only delivery company specialized in delivering colors.This is how you do it:1) Draw routes for your truck drivers. Make sure that every house receives the correct package.2) Press play.3) Sit back and watch while RGB Express delivers!Features:* 400 FREE levels* Easy gameplay suitable for all ages* Lots of challenges for puzzle game fans* Beautiful graphics* Excellent soundtrack and hilarious sound effectsThe game starts off with easy puzzles, which will teach you the many tricks, that help you solve the more difficult ones. There are bridges, buttons, sometimes you must swap cargo from one truck to another.. Eventually you will meet the mysterious white car!‚òÖ‚òÖ Pocket Gamer GOLD AWARD winner! ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ Already 7 million players! descriptionHTML:
RGB Express is a unique and beautiful puzzle game. Simple to play, yet super addictive!

You are running RGB Express, the one and only delivery company specialized in delivering colors.

This is how you do it:
1) Draw routes for your truck drivers. Make sure that every house receives the correct package.
2) Press play.
3) Sit back and watch while RGB Express delivers!

Features:
* 400 FREE levels
* Easy gameplay suitable for all ages
* Lots of challenges for puzzle game fans
* Beautiful graphics
* Excellent soundtrack and hilarious sound effects

The game starts off with easy puzzles, which will teach you the many tricks, that help you solve the more difficult ones. There are bridges, buttons, sometimes you must swap cargo from one truck to another.. Eventually you will meet the mysterious white car!

★★ Pocket Gamer GOLD AWARD winner! ★★
★★ Already 7 million players! Thank you all! ★★

Available In-App purchases:

KING TRUCK
* The premium version of RGB Express
* Removes ads
* Supports game development and future updates

HINTS
* The game contains 3 free hints that will help you if you get stuck. If you want to use more hints, you can buy them as in-app purchases.


Please note:
* Watching bonus videos after completing levels is optional. Press the arrow button to proceed to next level if you don't wish to watch a video
* TIP: Sign-in to Google Play Games at the main menu to unlock achievements! If you change your phone or tablet, you can then restore your game progress by signing in to Google Play Games before completing any levels. Please note that this only restores the progress based on the achievements (100% completed islands).

comments: THIS IS THE BEST GAME EVER!!! I totally recommend it to EVERYONE who loves addictive games and dragons. I find myself constantly playing this game all the time! I honestly feel like I can't say how much I LOVE this game with words. Again, this is the best game a player can have. Just one thing, I wish there were more ways to get gems instead of just buying 'cause I can't buy anything. So please make gems more easier to get.üòä

The is very fun because I have been playing since I was a kid and I still find it fun.  In the future sometimes instead of race can there a event where multiple players fight a power boss like dragon and the people are given prizes depending on there rank and they have to do a certain amount of damage to get the rewards instead of just letting them get it without trying

You know what? I was a long time gamer of this game. I breed a lot of dragons but eventually, all dragons that I hatched and feed are all gone. I don't know where it go but I know myself that I didn't sell any dragons unless I alrrady have that kind of dragon but then the pattern and patience of waiting an egg to hatch become a waste. Sad for my dear city.

Don't waste your time with this game. It started out as a really awesome game until I found out that the developers only care about getting your money and after they get your money they don't give you what you paid for and you spend a week fighting with the developers to get what you purchase. After you get to a certain level in the game you can either buy the gems so you can continue your progress or stay stuck where you are. I am uninstalling this game and I suggest that you don't waste your time with this game.

I'm hoping the update today fixes the glitches.  I got kicked out of a league match cause my device froze.  Never did that before til yesterdays update.  Please fix and I will give everything a five star

It is a good concept, but it is literally begging for money. I didn't log into Facebook so I have to pay like 20 gems just to be able to get my level limit for dragons +5. To get a metal habitat, I need to pay gems. To expand, as I am not logged into Facebook and so cannot pay by gold, I have to pay gems. It is so frustrating.

descriptionHTML:
Ready to take on the hottest role playing game out there and bend fire-breathing dragons to your will? Are you the one to claim the title of top Dragon Master in the world? Accept the challenge and prove your might!

Build a Dragon City on floating Islands and fill it with farms, habitats, buildings… and dragons! Collect and train your cute babies and evolve them into impressive beasts that will defend you in the PvP Arenas!

Join forces with other Dragon Masters in Alliances, interact in the chat and obtain rewards from the Alliance Chest.

Combine dragons of Fire, Nature, War, Legend and lots of other elements to hatch rare hybrids and expand your collection. You can also obtain dragons from exclusive events!

FEATURES

- Complete the Dragon Book! There are over 500 dragons to breed and collect.
- New dragons join the game every week through breeding events and special islands.
- Challenge yourself at the Dragon Quests and fight against other Masters in the PvP Arenas to collect exclusive dragons, claim Warrior’s Chests, and climb up the leaderboards!
- Summon dragons of the at the Tree Of Life and try their skills.
- Unlock advanced features like the Ancient World and the Guardian Dragons.
- Be social: Join Alliances to play with other masters, chat with them, and open Alliance Chests.
- Log in with Facebook to save your game and play on all your devices - That way you can take your baby dragons everywhere.

There are over 80 million Dragon Masters. What are you waiting for? Join the fun!

If you already love our dragons… Drop us a nice review :)

Dragon City is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet’s Settings.

Follow us on Twitter: @DragonCityGame
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DragonCity
Subscribe to our Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/DragonCityChannel

Check out other cool games by the creators of Dragon City: Monster Legends and World Chef!

description: Spring is in the air! Get in the mood for Easter with this wonderful match 3 game! Play over 1000 mesmerizing levels filled with many challenges. Collect the golden eggs, fill your basket with chocolate goodies and get the Easter bunny out of the magic hat. Clear the remaining ice, make the spring flowers bloom and collect the first butterflies. Eat the cookies, uncover the tasty cakes and fire off the explosive candy canes!Easter Sweeper will keep you engaged until long after Easter!There are no lives to lose, and you don't have to annoy your friends to progress. Play as long as you want. This game will fill your holidays with lots of pleasure!Swap, drag and sweep the sweet Easter pieces, like the Easter eggs, the chocolate bunnies, the creamy cupcakes, the candy stars and green spring leaves. Make matches of 4 or 5 to create powerful bombs and power-ups. And use the magic wand to collect a single piece. You'll be rewarded with cookies, cakes and lots of chocolates!Be sure to share the fun with your facebook friends. Invite them and compete with them in the leaderboards and on the level map!If you like holiday themed match 3 puzzle games, click and match, swap and match or any type of casual match 3 puzzle game then Easter Sweeper is the perfect game for you!Check out our facebook fan page for more match-3 goodness: https://www.facebook.com/SmileyGamer
descriptionHTML:

comments: Everything was great except in the beginning it kept saying I didn't find any mice but I found them twice on the first one.. but then I restarted it and it worked fine.. until it kept freezing and I had to restart my tablet.. after doing that like 5 times it worked great thru out the whole game.. I kinda felt like it was a lot shorter then the other games. But other then that I had fun playing it and I'm super excited for other to come out so hurryyy!!!!!!! Lol

This is just like the other game you guys made, the one with the doctor in the hospital, down to the exact same thing of "play the first couple of levels for free but if you like you pay" I bet this one is for the same price. On a side note, the story is different but the game play is the same, go have a look if you want. I will say this is a good game and I take nothing away from the hard work you have done. description: Help rookie detective Parker solve cases and bring criminals to justice!In Parker & Lane ‚Äì Criminal Justice, a streak of murders plagues the city. Become a homicide detective and restore law and order in this unique crime investigation game!Lily Parker is a smart and righteous detective who works hard to put criminals behind bars and make the world a better place, even if her own life is a mess. Victor Lane is a smug but charming criminal defense attorney who doesn‚Äôt care who he‚Äôs defending as long as he‚Äôs getting paid. He‚Äôs also the best at his job.When some of the criminals Lane defended in the past start dying, Parker‚Äôs forced to work with him to find the culprit. Could it be one of the criminal‚Äôs victims? descriptionHTML:
Help rookie detective Parker solve cases and bring criminals to justice!

In Parker & Lane – Criminal Justice, a streak of murders plagues the city. Become a homicide detective and restore law and order in this unique crime investigation game!

Lily Parker is a smart and righteous detective who works hard to put criminals behind bars and make the world a better place, even if her own life is a mess. Victor Lane is a smug but charming criminal defense attorney who doesn’t care who he’s defending as long as he’s getting paid. He’s also the best at his job.

When some of the criminals Lane defended in the past start dying, Parker’s forced to work with him to find the culprit. Could it be one of the criminal’s victims? Or perhaps some kind of vigilante? Is Lane himself being targeted?

Immerse yourself in the first episode of an exciting time management story game, feel the thrill of the chase and prove that your detective skills are second to none! Parker & Lane – Criminal Justice is waiting for you.

🕵️‍♀️ Help expose the hidden killer before another victim falls!
🔎 Look for evidence while investigating 9 different locations
🕵️‍♀️ Master 18 mini games based on forensic investigation
🔎 Examine clues and analyze objects using forensic techniques
🕵️‍♀️ Play through 60 extraordinary story levels and 30 extra challenge levels
🔎 Complete your case file by collecting diamonds
🕵️‍♀️ Conquer daily challenges to earn extra diamonds for your case file
🔎 Beat your high score with a choice of 15 awesome endless levels

Try the first few levels for free! To access the full game, you can either unlock everything with an in-app purchase, or continue playing the free version with ads.

Follow Parker & Lane on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GameHouseOriginalStories/

Download the GameHouse Original Stories app and enjoy other amazing games like Delicious, Heart's Medicine and Fabulous: https://goo.gl/SXb8sa

comments: Hello I've been playing this game for months, so much so that I began to pay to play it. In October of 2017 I had a late payment that resulted in me loosing my VIP status. However; My bank account reflected withdrawals of 9.99 for game plays from October 2017 until January 2018. Google was able to give my money back for January but I have to now contact the Administration of this game in order to be reimbursed for previous months. I love playing this game but I will no longer pay to play anymore.  I will keep you all posted on my outcome.

The game itself is very amazing in graphics and very creative. BUT as for the VIP membership, it's totally absurd that we have to pay $9.99 plus taxes monthly. I would be fine with it if it was $9.99 a year. Hope that this will change some day. I love playing this game. I play this EVERYDAY, even more than any other games. Please consider about changing the membership fee to yearly rather than monthly.

the game does too many resets, all on its own. i can be in the middle of a game, and the game will stop in mid-stream, then start a new game, and causing me to lose not only what i have "won", but will set me all the way back to the bronze box, or, in the case of special games, such as the winter sports 2018, back to the red box, when i actually finished and won the silver medal. the game can be veeerrrrryyyy slooooooooow, and often is. i enjoy the show when i get a chance to watch it, but am not so sure about the game. it would also be nice if there were instructions on how to play the features that are *not* in the tv show...

Decent amount of ads.  I sometimes have an issue where it suddenly stops accepting input. The game doesn't freeze, just can't do anything. I've tried going to home screen and back and even turning my screen off and back on, nothing works.  Have to force close it. :(  this happens maybe 1 out of every 7 or 8 times I play.  Samsung note 8.   A "live" or else "play with a friend" type of feature would be cool.

The game constantly freezes up causing your time to run out, costs you bonus rounds along with the "prize box" that is awarded for solving the bonus round. You also loose your progression from bronze to silver level boxes and so on, for completing consecutive bonus puzzles. Adds are continuous and are data hogs. Nothing worthwhile in its current state.

Extremely laggy, ads do not always close, and the game freezes or closes itself very often. It almost exclusively does that while in a game, so you automatically lose. The inbox always says there's 1 more message than there actually is. And sometimes hitting "play" closes the app instead of starting a game. Complete waste of time.

comments: I'm really fond of this game and love the gameplay and quick paced matches. The new update is AMAZING!   There are a few things that would make this game extra perfect for me!   Must have character customisation. This would be amazing to me. Char customisation makes me bind more to certain characters. The rings we get don't have much value to them except for upgrading the characters.  Could have non-ranked matches. I would love the option to play/practice against rivals or my own friends.   Should have quick chat responses. Would like to communicate before and after the match with simple reactions. Like Good luck and I win, tee-hee!

To many ads unless you make some kind of purchase. Loading screens seem to take longer than I'd like. You can't at this time play with friends as Opponents are automatically chosen. There is still some characters ability noise in the game even if you have music and sound off. I'd like to see characters abilities not to be so similar, but it isn't taking away from the game at the moment for me. With all that said though the graphics are great, the game is fun, and it's worth the $1.99 purchase I made.

This is one of the best mobile games I have played I a while. I probobly have a bias sense I love Sonic so much. However, if one thing could be added I would say it should be a converter for the Red Star rings to normal rings. Unless you want them to be payed for. I don't really care either way I'll just buy the Red Star rings but I brought up that idea because I currently have 23,000 rings just kinda waiting to be spent. Maybe incorporate phone backgrounds or some customizations for the game that cost extra rings? Thankyou so much for the new update and if anyone I'd debating on installing it just get it. You'll have fun, trust me.

It's basically Sonic Dash PVP mode. But that doesn't change the fact it's fun. Love the steady support of adding new characters and how every character feels unique despite everyone playing the same (sounds weird but you'll understand after you play it) my only gripe is that when I want to play I have to start the app, close it, then restart again otherwise it never loads

A fun premise ruined by a horrendous match making system,  ridiculous  unlocking time gates, and obvious pay to win incentives.  You'll be constantly matched with players with levels far higher than your own and the rewards are minimal for the all the effort.  The constant ads that play after every match is beyond irritating.

Love the game, but there's something wrong.. Well... I think Cream is kinda rigged. Her items are a bit OP for the other players which makes it an easy stage into a extremely hard stage. And also, the deduction of trophies in 4th place is too much! Please make it lower (like maybe at around 5 or 8) and change the deduction of trophies in 3rd place 0 (These are all just suggestions I have). If you read this SEGA, your games are great and keep up the good work!

descriptionHTML:
Your friends – fluffy kitten Kiki and adorable puppy Fifi – are inviting you to their new adventures at Royal Pet Hotel. Have fun while exploring the hotel and taking care of your virtual animal guests!

There is no time to be bored! Decorate Pet Hotel and design the most amazing reception desk. Help puppy Fifi to check-in and find her room. Unpack Fifi’s clothes, shoes and accessories, and style her bag. Don’t forget to feed Fifi when she is hungry! You can find her favorite dishes at the Hotel Café: pizza, doughnuts and juice cocktails!

Play pet style makeover in Kiki’s room, and create the perfect hair and makeup look. Take care of baby tiger Lili while she is taking a bath. Shop for stylish clothes and accessories for all animal friends, and feel free to ask cute fluffy hotel staff for help!

Kiki & Fifi Pet Hotel fun little games for kids:
· Style and decorate Reception to your own taste!
· Help little puppy Fifi to check-in and find her room!
· Unpack Fifi’s clothes and design her travel bag!
· Dry and comb Kiki’s beautiful hair and do her makeup!
· Help tiger Cara to take care of her baby Lili: bath her and style her hair!
· Feed Fifi yummy lunch at the Café!
· Dress up Kiki, Fifi, Cara and Lili in the most amazing outfits at the Fashion Shop!
· Call Reception if you have troubles – cute bunnies are ready to help you!
· Play Kiki & Fifi Pet Hotel game every day and collect rewards!
· Watch videos and get extra coins for new game items!


- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Crafted and play-tested with kids and toddlers, TutoTOONS games cherish the childhood and help children learn the basic life skills through the games they love. Dress up games can develop creativity and art skills, cleanup games build good every day habits, cooking games show how to help parents at home, pet games teach to share and care. These are just a few examples how TutoTOONS games let children explore the world around them and develop on their screen time.

This app is free to play but there are certain in-game items that may be purchased for real money. By downloading this app you agree to TutoTOONS Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

descriptionHTML:
A new kind of Mario game that you can play with one hand.

Super Mario Run has received some big updates! You control Mario by tapping as he constantly runs forward. You time your taps to pull off stylish jumps, midair spins, and wall jumps to gather coins and reach the goal!

Super Mario Run can be downloaded for free and after you purchase the game, you will be able to play all the modes with no additional payment required. You can try out all four modes before purchase: World Tour, Toad Rally, Remix 10, and Kingdom Builder.

■New mode Remix 10
Some of the shortest Super Mario Run courses you'll ever play!
This mode is Super Mario Run in bite-sized bursts! You'll play through 10 short courses one after the other, with the courses changing each time you play. Daisy is lost somewhere in Remix 10, so try to clear as many courses as you can to find her!

■New World Tour courses
A brand-new world of courses, World Star, has been added to World Tour mode! You can play this world after completing the first six worlds.

■World Tour
Run and jump with style to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser’s clutches!
Travel through plains, caverns, ghost houses, airships, castles, and more.

Clear the 24 exciting courses to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser, waiting in his castle at the end. There are many ways to enjoy the courses, such as collecting the 3 different types of colored coins or by competing for the highest score against your friends. You can try courses 1-1 to 1-4 for free.

■Toad Rally
Show off Mario’s stylish moves, compete against your friends, and challenge people from all over the world.

In this challenge mode, the competition differs each time you play.
Compete against the stylish moves of other players for the highest score as you gather coins and get cheered on by a crowd of Toads. Fill the gauge with stylish moves to enter Coin Rush Mode to get more coins. If you win the rally, the cheering Toads will come live in your kingdom, and your kingdom will grow.

■Kingdom Builder
Gather coins and Toads to build your very own kingdom.

Combine different buildings and decorations to create your own unique kingdom. There are over 100 kinds of items in Kingdom Builder mode. If you get more Toads in Toad Rally, the number of buildings and decorations available will increase. With the help of the friendly Toads you can gradually build up your kingdom.

■What You Can Do After Purchasing All Worlds

・ All courses in World Tour are playable
Why not try out the bigger challenges and thrills available in all courses?

・ Easier to get Rally Tickets
It's easier to get Rally Tickets that are needed to play Remix 10 and Toad Rally. You can collect them in Kingdom Builder through Bonus Game Houses and ? Blocks, by collecting colored coins in World Tour, and more.

・ More playable characters
If you rescue Princess Peach by completing course 6-4 and build homes for Luigi, Yoshi, and Toadette in Kingdom Builder mode, you can get them to join your adventures as playable characters. They play differently than Mario, so why not put their special characteristics to good use in World Tour and Toad Rally?

・ More courses in Toad Rally
The types of courses available in Toad Rally will increase to seven different types of courses, expanding the fun! Along with the new additions, Purple and Yellow Toads may also come to cheer for you.

・ More buildings and decorations in Kingdom Builder
The types of buildings available will increase, so you'll be able to make your kingdom even more lively. You can also place Rainbow Bridges to expand your kingdom.

・ Play Remix 10 without having to wait
You can play Remix 10 continuously, without having to wait between each game.

*Internet connectivity required to play. Data charges may apply.

comments: I love the game, the crafting system is awesome, the gameplay is great. However, there are some points that I suggest  1. Nerf the Damned, also the Lepers, they are strong for beginners. Club or Cart Thills can't beat them easily 2. Make another way to find leek seeds 3. Lepers can detect you sneaking to them, and they spawn out of nowhere. I don't know if it is a bug to me or not. 4. Cooking meat uses too much wood.  I look forward for more updates. It's a great game to be honest.  Edit: I love the events, especially the cart one.

I normally dont make reviews on games that i play unless it is really good. I love the hardcore atmosphere of the game,reminds me of the good old days when i still like playing minecraft. My only complaint is that the spawn rates for the undead e.g leepers, templars are too high in my opinion. Other than that. This is a great game

Honestly it's a great game and lots of fun but that energy mechanic needs to change. I know you can walk but it's still such a strange thing to gate your players out of playing.  Maybe if you could always travel at the same speed but if you didn't spend energy you could be attacked randomly while you travel. Or if energy was used to speed up crafting. I dunno but it's the only thing holding me back from a perfect score.

This game is awesome but here are the things like really want in the next game. 1. I need to disconnect with Google play to delete my old saved progress full of mistakes. Please add this feature. 2. Zombies are too hard to beat . Please decrease some of their capabilities. 3. There must be an increase in chest slots . 4. Please decrease the quantity of wood logs to cook. Otherwise all of our hardworking to gather logs while be replaced by only a few meats and others. 6. Please add another source of getting seeds. They are too hard to get.

Loved the game. Beautiful work but sadly its designed to open your wallet and doesn't even seem like they bothered trying to hide the fact.  I hope they fix some things so that you can actually play it. I will continue to play in hopes that it improves if it does ill re rate it.

The game is ok.. i love the idea.. but in all RPG and similar games you can accuire your items from when you died from your body in that zone.. also its good when you enter the inventory to pause the game.. when entering a zone the game should give some time before reseting the material and monsters if the player re-enters the same zone.. These are the most critical points so far i have encountered.. please take these in consideration.. thank you
description: Grim Soul is a free-to-play dark fantasy survival MMORPG. A once-prosperous Imperial province, the Plaguelands are now covered in fear and darkness. Its inhabitants have turned into endlessly wandering souls. Your goal is to survive as long as you can in this dangerous land. Collect resources, build a fortress, defend yourself from enemies, and survive combat with zombie-knights and other monsters in this new Souls-like game!‚óè EXPLORE NEW LANDSExplore lands afflicted by the Grey Decay. Discover mysterious Places of Power. Try infiltrating ancient dungeons and other survivors‚Äô castles to obtain the most valuable resources.‚óè LEARN CRAFTINGBuild workbenches and craft new resources. Discover new designs and create realistic medieval weapons and armor to battle with the Plaguelands‚Äô most dangerous inhabitants.‚óè IMPROVE YOUR CASTLEBuild a sound foundation for defenses against the undead and other survivors. Defend your citadel, construct and place traps for uninvited guests. But don‚Äôt forget to explore your enemies‚Äô territory to collect valuable loot.‚óè DEFEAT ENEMIESMorning star? Halberd? Maybe an arbalet? Choose from an arsenal of deadly weapons. Deal critical hits and evade enemy attacks. Use different fighting styles. Find an effective strategy for wielding every type of weapon!‚óè SADDLE YOUR HORSEBuild a stable and don‚Äôt miss your chance to gallop into battle against hordes of undead on your war horse or ride through a grim medieval landscape. You can build a boat, a cart, and even a carriage - if you can obtain the necessary parts.‚óè OVERCOME HARDSHIPLife in the Plaguelands is solitary, poor, nasty, brutish and short. Hunger and thirst will kill you faster than cold steel in this sinister medieval MMORPG. Conquer nature, hunt dangerous animals, prepare their meat over an open fire, or kill other survivors to replenish your reserves.‚óè BEFRIEND THE RAVENSBuild a raven cage and these smart birds will be your messengers. Watch the skies. Ravens always circle over something of interest. And that which ravens take interest in will always be of interest for a lonely Exile.‚óè JOIN A CLANA clan will increase your chances of surviving one more day in this cruel and bitter medieval world. Call your brothers in arms to cut down damned knights and bloodthirsty witches.‚óè PREPARE FOR THE NIGHTWhen night descends, darkness floods the world, and you‚Äôll need light to escape the terrifying Night Guest.‚óè RECEIVE REWARDSYou may feel alone, but you are not. There‚Äôs always something to do. Complete quests that bring ravens and receive rewards. Take every chance - that‚Äôs the best strategy for survival in the grim reality of this forgotten kingdom.‚óè SOLVE THE MYSTERYSearch for letters and scrolls to learn about the Empire‚Äôs ancient history. Find keys to solving the mystery of your past and the truth behind this unfolding catastrophe.Life in the Plaguelands is a constant battle not only with hunger and thirst but with hordes of undead and cursed beasts. Conquer nature and fight in this action RPG for real heroes. Become a legend! Storm enemy castles, collect loot, and rule the Plaguelands from an iron throne!Grim Soul is a free-to-play MMORPG, but it contains in-game items that can be purchased. You must be at least 13 years of age to download this game and begin your adventures in Grim Soul. Your strategy for survival will determine everything. Begin your journey and become a hero in a brutal game for fearless warriors.
descriptionHTML:
Grim Soul is a free-to-play dark fantasy survival MMORPG. A once-prosperous Imperial province, the Plaguelands are now covered in fear and darkness. Its inhabitants have turned into endlessly wandering souls. Your goal is to survive as long as you can in this dangerous land. Collect resources, build a fortress, defend yourself from enemies, and survive combat with zombie-knights and other monsters in this new Souls-like game!

● EXPLORE NEW LANDS

Explore lands afflicted by the Grey Decay. Discover mysterious Places of Power. Try infiltrating ancient dungeons and other survivors’ castles to obtain the most valuable resources.

● LEARN CRAFTING

Build workbenches and craft new resources. Discover new designs and create realistic medieval weapons and armor to battle with the Plaguelands’ most dangerous inhabitants.

● IMPROVE YOUR CASTLE

Build a sound foundation for defenses against the undead and other survivors. Defend your citadel, construct and place traps for uninvited guests. But don’t forget to explore your enemies’ territory to collect valuable loot.

● DEFEAT ENEMIES

Morning star? Halberd? Maybe an arbalet? Choose from an arsenal of deadly weapons. Deal critical hits and evade enemy attacks. Use different fighting styles. Find an effective strategy for wielding every type of weapon!

● SADDLE YOUR HORSE

Build a stable and don’t miss your chance to gallop into battle against hordes of undead on your war horse or ride through a grim medieval landscape. You can build a boat, a cart, and even a carriage - if you can obtain the necessary parts.

● OVERCOME HARDSHIP

Life in the Plaguelands is solitary, poor, nasty, brutish and short. Hunger and thirst will kill you faster than cold steel in this sinister medieval MMORPG. Conquer nature, hunt dangerous animals, prepare their meat over an open fire, or kill other survivors to replenish your reserves.

● BEFRIEND THE RAVENS

Build a raven cage and these smart birds will be your messengers. Watch the skies. Ravens always circle over something of interest. And that which ravens take interest in will always be of interest for a lonely Exile.

● JOIN A CLAN

A clan will increase your chances of surviving one more day in this cruel and bitter medieval world. Call your brothers in arms to cut down damned knights and bloodthirsty witches.

● PREPARE FOR THE NIGHT

When night descends, darkness floods the world, and you’ll need light to escape the terrifying Night Guest.

● RECEIVE REWARDS

You may feel alone, but you are not. There’s always something to do. Complete quests that bring ravens and receive rewards. Take every chance - that’s the best strategy for survival in the grim reality of this forgotten kingdom.

● SOLVE THE MYSTERY

Search for letters and scrolls to learn about the Empire’s ancient history. Find keys to solving the mystery of your past and the truth behind this unfolding catastrophe.


Life in the Plaguelands is a constant battle not only with hunger and thirst but with hordes of undead and cursed beasts. Conquer nature and fight in this action RPG for real heroes. Become a legend! Storm enemy castles, collect loot, and rule the Plaguelands from an iron throne!

Grim Soul is a free-to-play MMORPG, but it contains in-game items that can be purchased. You must be at least 13 years of age to download this game and begin your adventures in Grim Soul. Your strategy for survival will determine everything. Begin your journey and become a hero in a brutal game for fearless warriors.

Then they want tokens, which you must buy, to go further. The deals on weapons that are offered are always just out of reach. You can earn diamonds watching videos but I would rather play a game than waste time watching stupid add so I can play a game. It was fun but no more. Deleting.

After the update on 2nd Mar-18, Spec ops not loading. Game simply terminate itself while trying to load spec ops Level 16. Everything else is working fine. I'm stuck üòìüò™ Update: now I can't play even Daily Missionüò©üò§

It is far too difficult to advance in this game without spending money. The developers get money from ads, and I'm willing to watch them, but not for 1 diamond every 30 seconds, when the smallest upgrade in weapons is 360. They must not want people to keep playing an otherwise good game.

This is the most grindy game I have ever played. To get anywhere close to a smooth play through, you have to spend obscene amounts of money. It'd be just as much money to buy a PlayStation 3 and fallout 3, and you'd have better graphics, better shooting, and shorter load times. Plus, every level and every gun has to be downloaded separately. It's over 200 mb for me, and I only played for a day and got to level 2!
Played a bunch of sniper games and so far this one's #1. Going to keep playing and hope i wont have to change my 5star rating. Thanks for a fun free game developers!. Now playing on LG6

descriptionHTML:
AIM and SHOOT! Download now for FREE one of the best fps shooting games!
Start the killing: FIGHT the global war on crime and become the ULTIMATE SHOOTER.

Get yourself a gun and start shooting, clash with the criminals!

Sniper 3D Assassin® in 7 words: great gameplay, awesome visuals and entertaining missions. And best of all? It's a free fps game to pass the time! Defend the victims from kidnappings to bomb attacks, hostage survival is critical!

- Ultra REALISTIC 3D graphics and cool animations
- HUNDREDS of thrilling MISSIONS
- Tons of letal GUNS and mortal WEAPONS
- ADDICTING gameplay (FPS)
- EASY and INTUITIVE controls
- FREE game: play it both on your phone and tablet

DOWNLOAD the app for FREE now and don't miss amazing NEW CONTENT on periodic UPDATES. If you like fighting games, you will love the cool Sniper 3D game! Take down the bad guy from his fantasy, and get the glory for saving the victim. The final word is with you, and the rules are clear: aim and shoot!

Forget those dumb, repetitive shooting games. Here, your duty will include racing against time, exploding helicopters in American cities, killing zombies and quite a few shots in slow motion. Survival is necessary! But can you solve the puzzle, save the victims and kill only the right target hidden in the crowd? Can you stop the virus from spreading? You received the call for duty of saving the people.

Read what millions of extremely happy players have say about Sniper 3D. Check out our reviews!

Sniper 3D Assassin® is brought to you by Fun Games For Free.

The best first person shooter (fps) action game! Be the best professional sniper in every environment! The combat is real, and you can be the hero.

● Hundreds of mission:
"Alpha, Bravo, Charlie, do you copy?" Find the target, aim, shoot.
Save the state secrets from the rogue agents and spies, and stop them from spreading a terrible virus. Do you have the skills? Help your country in the massive nuclear competition. Be accurate and save the hostages and victims of the enemy.

● Start racing to kill a zombie army and prevent global war and destruction. Don't leave any zombie alive: start to shoot and kill them all! Are you prepared to all the action and adventure in this awesome fps shooting game? Can you guarantee the survival of the human race?

● Unlock awesome weapons and upgrade them with evolutions in the arsenal:
Buy the best Sniper rifles, assault rifles, shotguns or Pistols that exist with the gem you earn in the game! Upgrade the ammo, the grip, the calibre to get bullets that inflict more damage, better range, scope, stability, or zoom. Will you choose the hunting rifle, the awesome assault mp5 or a gun Glock or colt in the armory?

● Play it anywhere
Sniper 3D does not require you to be always online in order to have fun. You can enjoy it offline in the subway, while flying on a (real) plane, in the car on the road, during services in a temple (or maybe even on toilet!). From time to time, it may be necessary to download additional (free) content online.

● PvP mode
Try out the pvp mode: prepare your gun and hunt your enemy. You should kill him first. The pvp mode will test your speed in killing and hunting. Take long and you will be dead. Get into action now and enjoy the adventure in this top shooting game! Follow the rules of your training and act!

● Limited data usage
Our game will not consume tons of data from your mobile plan that you'd want to use instead to surf the web, watch youtube videos and listen to free music. Have fun with limited data usage.

● Disclaimer
Sniper 3D Assassin® is a free game but it contains mature content and optional in-app purchases for real money. You may want to keep away it from your kids and younger boys

descriptionHTML:
Scooter Freestyle Extreme 3D 2, is the sequal to the first Scooter FE3D game.

The sequal has a massive upgrade to graphics, physics, animations, and pretty much everything else.

Awesome freestyle scooter game in 3D.
Go blast the skatepark to earn points to upgrade and customize your character, your scooter and your skills.

Whether you like skating street, or big ramps, half pipes and bowls, Scooter FE3D 2 has it all!

Ride fast, do manuals, slides, flip tricks, grabs, wall rides and all the other tricks you can imagine, and line them together for insane combos like the pros!

Customize your characters clothes and scooter!

Earn skill points to level up your characters skills, like jump height, spin speed and more!

Play 3 different game modes: Arcade Mode, S-C-O-O-T Mode and Free Run!

The game is developed by independent developer EnJen Games. Follow EnJen Games on www.facebook.com/EnJenGames, to request new features, report bugs, or get the latest news about new EnJen Games or updates!

comments: I play this game regularly, and I enjoy the differing modes available. You can play happily without paying for any additional content, however at higher levels paying will help you progress. By this time you will have poured hours into it, so I do not think it is unreasonable. Save your gold until later levels (player level 15+) and you can get by without in game purchases for quite a while.

I absolutely love this game. Turn based tactics are one of my favourite types of games. Since playing the game more I've decided that there's not enough gas for me to be able to enjoy the game like I want to. I think the car should either hold more, or gas should be easier to get. This is just a game that already has inconsistencies with reality. Otherwise I love the game

Just loved it... I am at council level 18 now... Weapon upgrade xp cost should be reduced or just remove workshop. No use of WORKSHOP with such high xp cost because its REASONABLE to upgrade your SURVIVOR than their WEAPONS.... Please for next update reduce weapon upgrade cost....

I've been playing this game for two years now and I can never put it down. It's such an amazing game. I'd like it even more though if the characters we originally fell in love with were available. Like Andrea, T-Dog, Lori, etc.

I like this game, but the reason I'm giving it a 2 star rating because the game can't load. After the first time I played it, when I went to play it again it froze. I've been waiting at the game to load for like 5 minutes and decided that the game was broken. Can I get help, I might change my rating.

Great time waster. Wish the gas would increase quicker. Hero's are pretty easy to get after a while. Freemium aspects of the game not shoved down your throat they are there but not essential (So far) LVL 25

descriptionHTML:
Play now with Daryl, Rick, Michonne and many other characters of AMC’s The Walking Dead! Collect Heroes through radio calls and unlock special abilities and valuable leader traits. Complete Episode 1 for free Daryl tokens and unlock the first Hero of your team!

The Walking Dead: No Man’s Land is a thrilling, action-packed RPG where tactical choices make the difference between life and death. Only the strongest will survive so choose your team wisely: bring Michonne and dominate in close-quarter combat or send Rick to dispatch enemies from afar. Or perhaps you’ll choose to snipe from a distance with Daryl’s crossbow, or mow the herd down with Abraham’s assault rifle.

• FIGHT through hordes of deadly enemies in tactical turn-based combat
• COLLECT and upgrade your favorite characters from AMC’s The Walking Dead
• CHOOSE the right team and the equipment for each mission
• HUNT walkers in Terminus, The Prison and other familiar locations from AMC’s The Walking Dead
• JOIN other players in deadly weekly challenges and PVP combat for exclusive rewards

“Throw in some pretty swish graphics, lovely animations and blood splatters, and you have one of the most carefully fleshed out zombie games we've seen on mobile. It looks lovely, and plays great too.” - Pocketgamer

“Each aspect of survival on AMC's The Walking Dead has been parallel to the series' official mobile game, subtitled No Man's Land.” - Mashable

“Imagine your favorite mobile base-building strategy game, mix in a dash of XCOM, and then paint on a fresh coat of AMC’s The Walking Dead. That’s No Man’s Land in a nutshell.” - Gamezebo

For more, please visit:

http://www.facebook.com/thewalkingdeadnomansland
http://twitter.com/twdnomansland
http://www.thewalkingdeadnomansland.com
http://www.youtube.com/nxtgms

The update includes many bug fixes and performance improvements.

descriptionHTML:
Help your people! Join the fight against the Skeleton Boss, and become the best hero in the dungeons.

Live a real adventure with this online Action MMORPG game. Enjoy Dungeon Legends for free, and discover an endless world of battles, quests, and epic creatures.

Dungeon Legends is a hack & slash game optimized for mobile devices. A classic ARPG experience adapted to touch screens.

Fight against other players in the pvp multiplayer modes like the Arena, and become a legend of the dungeons. Go over the dungeons looking for incredible adventures, and legendary treasures, or ask for help to overcome the quests of the online cooperative multiplayer mode. Join a clan and fight the most epic battles to conquer the dungeons.

Adapt your hero to your gameplay. Turn your Dwarf into an epic warrior, a healer, a hunter or a protector. Train your hero in the adventure quests, and fight other heroes in the online pvp multiplayer arena.

🐲 BUILD YOUR OWN ADVENTURE
It was a long time ago, but Dwarfs remember the Skeleton Boss. He attacked the villages with his army of goblins, skeletons, trolls, and balrogs. But Dwarfs do not surrender, they fear nothing, and they cooperated to hunt their enemies, and battle that army.
Dwarfs defeated the Skeleton Boss, and force him to hide in the ancient Dungeons.

Now, the Skeleton Boss is back.

He is summoning an army to leave his prison, and take revenge on the Dwarfs.
The Skeleton Boss is waiting in his throne, deep in the Dungeons.The only hope for the Dwarfs is to find him, cooperate, and hunt him before he recovers his power.

🔮DISCOVER AN ENDLESS ADVENTURE RPG GAME
Each quest in this Action RPG is unique. Unleash your arcane powers, and hack and slash the evil creatures with a good strategy to obtain legendary rewards. Hunt the evil in the campaign or take part on the multiplayer battles onlines.

⚔️ FIGHT IN THE ONLINE MULTIPLAYER ARENA
Fight epic PvP battles with other heroes, or the online multiplayer modes. Enter the arena alone or with friends, and prove you are the best evil hunter in the dungeons.

🏆 PARTICIPATE IN PVE/PVP EVENTS
Help your fellows dwarves in the PvE events, and compete with them in the PvP battles. Each week there is a new opportunity to prove yourself as the best dwarf.

🎮 ENJOY A TRUE ACTION RPG GAME
This mmorpg controls are designed for touch screens. Hack & Slash game mechanics adapted to mobile devices.

🎁SHARE YOUR ADVENTURES ONLINE
Explore the online multiplayer coop adventures with your friends. Cooperate with other epic heroes online to complete the hardest quests or fight against them in the online multiplayer PvP arena.

⭐️ AWESOME FEATURES:
- Play a true Action RPG adventure
- Enjoy the Hack & Slash mechanics
- Fight in epic multiplayer battles against other heroes online
- Join other heroes to complete the online coop quests
- Play PvP fights in the dungeons
- Participate in weekly PvE events
- Team up with your friends in the online coop adventure
- PvE events, PvP battles, online multiplayer battles, and coop battles can be played for free

If you are looking for a new hack & slash game and mobile action rpg game, this mmorpg adventure game will be your new favourite RPG, action MMO, online RPG, and PvP game. Will you be the best dwarf? Be prepared for amazing boss battles, legendary online PvE quests, coop multiplayer levels full of action, and a new world full of arcane magic.

Please note:
- This epic MMORPG game is free to play, but in-apps items can be purchased with real money. To restrict in-app purchases adjust the settings on your device.
- Dungeon Legends is an online ARPG game, and requires an Internet connection to play.
