descriptionHTML:
Are you looking for fun, easy but free educational toddlers games to help your kids (boys and girls) learn preschool vocabulary (alphabet, numbers, colors, shapes, fruits, vegetables, animals, vehicles...)? Don't look far away, this learning game is made for you.

We have carefully developed this kids app as we wanted to amaze your toddlers while teaching them their first words. We have integrated cartoon and nursery rhymes to not make learning boring for the babies.

It's more than an ABC learning game for kids, it's a comprehensive educational app for toddlers with various features :
- Alphabet learning game : Learn the 26 letters of the alphabet
- Numbers learning game : Learn counting from 1 to 20
- Colors learning game : 11 colors to learn (Red, Blue, Yellow, Green, Orange, Pink, Purple, Brown, Black, White, Gray)
- Shapes learning game : 12 shapes to learn (Circle, cross, diamond, heart, heptagon, hexagon, octagon, pentagon, rectangle, square, star, triangle)
- Fruits learning game : 16 fruits to learn (Apple, banana, blueberry, cherries, grapefruit, grapes, kiwi, lemon, melon, orange, peach, pears, pineapple, plums, strawberry, watermelon)
- Vegetables learning game : 16 veggies to learn (Asparagus, bean, broccoli, carrot, corn, cucumber, eggplant, green onion, green pepper, lettuce, mushroom, onion, potato, pumpkin, sweet potato, tomato)
- Animals learning game : 24 animals to learn (Alligator, cat, chicken, cow, dog, donkey, elephant, fox, frog, giraffe, gorilla, hippo, horse, lion, monkey, pig, rabbit, rhino, sheep, snake, tiger, turkey, zebra)
- Sea animals learning game : 14 sea animals to learn (Clam, crab, dolphin, fish, jellyfish, lobster, octopus, seahorse, shark, squid, starfish, stingray, turtle, whale)
- Transport learning game : 16 vehicles to learn (Airplane, ambulance, bicycle, bulldozer, bus, car, dump truck, fire engine, helicopter, motorcycle, police car, rocket, ship, taxi, train, truck)

In the next updates, we will include :
- Time learning game
- Countries learning game
- Jobs learning game
- And more

- Aladdin
- Baby Mouse
- Catty
- Peppa Pig
- Tchoupi
- Unicorn Pony
- Popeye
- Doggy Dog
- Teddy Bear

comments: My partner is awesome and it doesn't out Trump you or play like a suicide bomber either. Tried the rest but this is the best for free guys. Awesome job. Asthetics is good and simple. Be great if you could put a 'speed slider' dial to slow gameplay down, so as my young master can play whilst learning. Superb guys n gals. This one is definitely worth trying. Beats Zelda's 'free game' she, wants to Trump you out most times.

Love this game! I've read lots of reviews and they kind of surprised me. This game seems to me to pretty accurately reflect Euchre when we play at home. Good hands, bad hands, balances out pretty evenly in the end. We don't use the "Going Under" feature, but it would sure be a help if you are stuck with at least 3 9s&10s to be able to switch with the pile!‚úî The gold circle with the D in it indicates the dealer. The Trump suit is put beside the player who called Trump. Fast, easy, fun!

Bots call Trump when they can't even take 2 tricks, so I'm constantly getting set or setting the other team. It's nice for practice to get use to thinking out probabilities, but that all goes out the window when a bot leads out with the 10 of trump on the first play. Bot logic needs a lot of help to make it realistic.

This game was and is great. I am not a big fan of the constant 5 second ads now though. I understand it is a free app that needs to be supported by ads but it is after every round now  I and I am losing interest because it takes too long to  I play now. I hope you get it sorted out though. Whenever my right calls Bauer and I lead with an offsuit Ace,they NEVER ever have that suit. If I am making it,that same Opponent to my right ALWAYS has an offsuit ace as the stopper . Becoming too predictable in that way. Also,I have never played euchre in real life where you order up your partner and they play too.

Nice Very cool.  Am using it to teach my teenage children the game :)  on the downside - it's not often I'm dealt a decent hand.  N sometimes my partner stuffs up big time (like what were they thinking) :) but then again so do I lol.

The A-I makes it impossible to win unless you play on easy mode. Table talk is an understatement...the cpu gets at least 5 viable loaner hands every game on medium or above and the partners always have just the right cards available. Not random at all and no skill required. Let the players play and don't load the cpu's hand every hand. Ugh
description: Euchre is a classic trick taking card game, similar to Hearts and Spades. It's widely played in the United States, where it's also known as Bacon, and in other English speaking countries. In Euchre Free: Classic Card Game you play with 3 other players, forming 2 teams, and the deck in play consists of the 9, 10, J, Q, K and A cards. There is always a trump and your objective is to score 10 or more points. You get these points in matches with 5 tricks, where the team that scores the most points and tricks wins.In Euchre Free: Classic Card Game, you play just like in real life, choosing between accepting the trump, passing or changing your cards, playing the match with your partner or going alone. Play the best cards and use the trumps wisely to win the tricks.Features:- 3 difficulty levels: choose between easy, medium and hard.- Customize the cards from the deck and the table.- Autosave: restart the game from where you stopped.- Statistics with your performance in the game.- 100% free game, with unlimited matches.If you like card games like Hearts, Spades, 500 and other trick taking card games, you will love Euchre!Download Euchre Free: Classic Card Game now and get ready for hours of fun with this classic card game. And don‚Äôt get euchred!
descriptionHTML:
Euchre is a classic trick taking card game, similar to Hearts and Spades. It's widely played in the United States, where it's also known as Bacon, and in other English speaking countries. In Euchre Free: Classic Card Game you play with 3 other players, forming 2 teams, and the deck in play consists of the 9, 10, J, Q, K and A cards. There is always a trump and your objective is to score 10 or more points. You get these points in matches with 5 tricks, where the team that scores the most points and tricks wins.

In Euchre Free: Classic Card Game, you play just like in real life, choosing between accepting the trump, passing or changing your cards, playing the match with your partner or going alone. Play the best cards and use the trumps wisely to win the tricks.

Features:

- 3 difficulty levels: choose between easy, medium and hard.
- Customize the cards from the deck and the table.
- Autosave: restart the game from where you stopped.
- Statistics with your performance in the game.
- 100% free game, with unlimited matches.

If you like card games like Hearts, Spades, 500 and other trick taking card games, you will love Euchre!

Download Euchre Free: Classic Card Game now and get ready for hours of fun with this classic card game. And don’t get euchred!

descriptionHTML:
Lose yourself in the mysterious Elven Wonderland as you play solitaire across beautiful maps filled with magic, wonder and lots of interesting creatures!

Explore the Elven Woods and beyond!
The Elven Wonderland is full of amazing, mystical places. From the Elven Woods to the Frozen Lakes, you’ll have over 75 levels of solitaire to enjoy as you embark on a quest across each land. Every month, the solitaire story is expanded with brand new exciting maps and levels – so keep checking back for new updates!

A classic card game with a magical twist
Bringing the fun of solitaire to your smartphone – with a sprinkle of Elven magic – you’ll have hours of fun playing this relaxing single player card game. Just clear the piles of cards on the screen by selecting the card one value up or down from the card shown at the bottom of the screen. When you clear all the cards, you win!

Daily tasks & lots of free bonuses!
The Elven Wonderland is full of treasures and generous creatures who love to help you on your solitaire quest! Each day the wood elves will give you a list of tasks to earn extra coins, complete these tasks every day for huge rewards. Don’t want to complete tasks? You’ve been given a magical bowl that fills up with coins slowly for you to empty every day! If that wasn’t enough, you can replay each level to earn even more coins!

============================
Solitaire Quest – Highlights
============================
• A fun, relaxing single player card game
• Play solitaire across beautifully designed maps across Fairy Wonderland
• Over 75 levels with more added each month
• Unique elements in each level such as golden and locked cards
• Daily tasks – complete them for huge free rewards
• Empty the coin globe each day for free coins
• Spend your coins to unlock new, unique card sets and styles
• Get useful power ups to help on your solitaire quest
• Play solitaire offline – no internet connection needed

Your quest across the Elven Wonderland…

Elven Woods – Levels 1-20
Start your solitaire adventure in the elven woods. Full of fairies, wood elves and colourful mushrooms, you’re sure to meet some interesting characters to help you on your journey!

Frozen Mountains – Levels 21-40
Meet reindeer, enchanted snowmen and more as you play solitaire on the frozen path through the mountains. Be careful – it’s slippery!

Wood Elf Village – Levels 41-60
The simple wood elves live in beautiful houses carved into giant mushrooms and huge oak trees. Play solitaire and meet the elves who live here – maybe they’ll let you stay the night before you continue on your journey!

Red Road Pass – Levels 61-80
Once an active volcano, Red Road Pass is now a rough road of bright red stone. Discover rare gems as you walk along this challenging path playing solitaire with the mice who call it home.

***More levels coming soon***

==================================================================
BE PART OF YOUR OWN SOLITAIRE STORY IN THE ELVEN WONDERLAND!
==================================================================

comments: This is by far the best chess "trainer" for me.  It's got a nice flow and the game isn't "stupid" like most other chess apps/games I've played.  I plat at least a few games every night and I feel like it give me a nice challenge and makes me really think about the moves I'm making.  Especially at the higher difficulty levels.  Overall a great chess app with no glitches and a good brain inside of it.  A must for a chess player with any real skill at the game.

I really was worried it would be too easy or too tough. tho I am not a master, yet, I know my way around the board.  I realized it has been making me a spectacular player ..the computer does not just do the same dumb moves over and over its almost like its stalking me like prey around the board! ha great game!!!-!!

I love this game and the best brain exerciser game ever in the history.  The cool 3d view makes the game as if I am playing on the real board, very good graphics. However, it doesn't show the list of killed chessman during game play the only drawback. I am expecting this upgradation and this will be the perfect Android chess.

For the non experts, let me tell you that 5his game cheats. I sat with a real chessboard to analyse why wasn't I  able to crack master level.   And what i observed was it didn't allow you to make actual moves when you show high levels of intell8gence. Sometimes it makes moves which are faulty. I think there is some mistakes in coding, perhaps deliberately made.  So not a fair play but a foul play.

So far it's o.k. I like the fact that it is simply a chess game with no fancy sound effects or graphics. I see no real reason to have the higher difficulty levels locked out until they are beaten but they are. I got it to practice with. It is useful for that. It's not bad...Just a simple down to earth chess game

The game has been drawn because the other player has no legal move and is not in check. If they can ot move then I win because they cannot move to a legal position. The computer ends the games too early because they cannot be bothered to chase you around the board. You cannot unlock the higher difficulty games because it just says draw.
description: Chess in your AndroidChess is a board game for two players. It is played on a square board, made of 64 smaller squares, with eight squares on each side. Each player starts with sixteen pieces: eight pawns, two knights, two bishops, two rooks, one queen and one king. The goal of the game is for each player to try and checkmate the king of the opponent. Checkmate is a threat ('check') to the opposing king which no move can stop. It ends the game.During the game the two opponents take turns to move one of their pieces to a different square of the board. One player ('White') has pieces of a light color; the other player ('Black') has pieces of a dark color. There are rules about how pieces move, and about taking the opponent's pieces off the board. The player with white pieces always makes the first move. Because of this, White has a small advantage, and wins more often than Black in tournament games.Chess is popular and is often played in competitions called chess tournaments. It is enjoyed in many countries, and is a national hobby in Russia.Features:- five different themes- seven levels of difficulty- two players mode- game assistant (Helper)- realistic graphics- sound effects- small size
descriptionHTML:
Chess in your Android

Chess is a board game for two players. It is played on a square board, made of 64 smaller squares, with eight squares on each side. Each player starts with sixteen pieces: eight pawns, two knights, two bishops, two rooks, one queen and one king. The goal of the game is for each player to try and checkmate the king of the opponent. Checkmate is a threat ('check') to the opposing king which no move can stop. It ends the game.

During the game the two opponents take turns to move one of their pieces to a different square of the board. One player ('White') has pieces of a light color; the other player ('Black') has pieces of a dark color. There are rules about how pieces move, and about taking the opponent's pieces off the board. The player with white pieces always makes the first move. Because of this, White has a small advantage, and wins more often than Black in tournament games.

Chess is popular and is often played in competitions called chess tournaments. It is enjoyed in many countries, and is a national hobby in Russia.

Features:

- five different themes
- seven levels of difficulty
- two players mode
- game assistant (Helper)
- realistic graphics
- sound effects
- small size
summary: Chess is a board logic game with beautiful graphics and progressive levels
title: Chess

* Hardware tesselation of PSP Beziers and Splines (used by a few games)

Play 'The Long Journey' and feel like you are in a Gigantic Adventure Game with a Massive and Abandoned world to explore!If you love Adventure Games & Mystery Games with a storyline that will Captivate you from the start, then you will LOVE The Long Journey - Adventure Games & Point & Click.Travel to a faraway and distant land nestled in the mountains, where mankind is often unseen, and stories of the ages unfold. It appears to be another world - totally uncharted territory, where only outliers dwell.With a backpack as your only supply, you start your journey through the vast woods, picking up clues on your expedition.Along your way, you see visions of young children in the distance, waving you to keep moving along, as if there is a path and destiny to be reached.Where did you come from? descriptionHTML:
Do you love Adventure Games? Do you love Escape Games & Intriguing Puzzles? Do you love solving Mystery Games? Play 'The Long Journey' and feel like you are in a Gigantic Adventure Game with a Massive and Abandoned world to explore!

If you love Adventure Games & Mystery Games with a storyline that will Captivate you from the start, then you will LOVE The Long Journey - Adventure Games & Point & Click.

Travel to a faraway and distant land nestled in the mountains, where mankind is often unseen, and stories of the ages unfold.

You crash land in a very isolated, dense area in the forest. It appears to be another world - totally uncharted territory, where only outliers dwell.

With a backpack as your only supply, you start your journey through the vast woods, picking up clues on your expedition.

Along your way, you see visions of young children in the distance, waving you to keep moving along, as if there is a path and destiny to be reached.

Where did you come from? Who are these young children, and what are they leading you into?

The mystery of the Long Journey will unravel before your very eyes, and another improbable twist ending will unveil and leave you astounded, and wanting to discuss the turn of events that lead up to the epic finale...

Features Include:

Over 110 Gorgeous HDR Scenes from many places around the world, sewn together to bring you one stunning game.

Beautifully crafted music and sounds immerse you into a whole other world.

Captivating new storyline that builds up into an improbable twist ending!

Includes a Map System, Hints, Answers & other tips and tricks to help you along the way!

comments: This is overall the best golf game I have come across or any app, in general, relating to sports. My only problem is that sometimes people do not want to, not do not have the ability to create a facebook account. I wish there would be a way to play with your family; without the facebook account users perks.

I like the game, and it's addictive, but the mechanics are absolutely flawed. There have been tons of instances where the game has unfairly screwed me or other player's over. 1. Places mystery boxes in front of the player who drives second, but not the first player. 2. Hills like to stop a ball, that is being shot full force by an iron club, in it's tracks. 3. The swinging spike balls only affect some players golf balls, but not others.  Things like this piss people off, because they expect the game to be fair. Those small things easily aid a player in losing a match.

This game would be awesome if it matched you with people equal to your level but it doesn't. So I spend more time trying to get to the higher levels and not able to upgrade equipment. Of course you could always purchase money but I'm not big on doibg that!

Fun game. But you definitely have things to fix. Like the fact that sometimes when you win, you still lose. And I'm not talking about having less gems. I'm talking  when the other player doesn't even in the hole. Definitely a glitch. Also, as far as controls....easy enough. But sometimes while I'm in the middle of a backswing, the ball will shoot on it's own without me releasing it. Which sucks because it's a wasted shot and usually costs you the match. Aside from those two irritating problems, it really is a fun game. I will continue to play, hoping you fix the issues.

Game cheats, puts you against lower lol players with better equipment who make ungodly shots, or much higher level where you don't have a chance. I hit things that aren't there, and with a crossword my ball will fly into the wind with no action. Opponent Always get better wind and direction, and will outshoot you work lower equipmeny.

I love the game I find it very entertaining. I also like being able to interact globally. But the only one thing that I would change, would be to make the analog where you pull back your driver smaller screened devices. Besides that I have no complaints. I love the game! üòäüòä

comments: Amazing addictive game. Try it out! Not too many ads, and just the right amount of challenge without pulling your hair out. Sometimes there's a hidden dot in the title, or ones that are almost the same color as the background, but it's not bad enough to lose a star.

Updated with no fix...  problem still persists.  No exit button and controls for the back button are very wonky. Need to add dedicated exit button or fix what happens when you tap / swipe the blank park of the screen. Trying to bring the controls up from their hidden state selects options is frustrating. You end up starting games. Very unpolished controls, imo.

Cool game, only bad thing is that tutorial levels are rated as bronze so you can never have all gold.. I tried doing the same tutorial three times in a row, then it is counted as gold, but when you exit the game and enter again that it is bronze again

Interesting puzzle type game.  Using rope is a bit challenging on small screens.  It used way too much background data which is not have related at all.  My phone gets hot when using the app.  Uninstalling
Different and fun. Not too hard but still challenging.  Daily challenges are impossible to complete though (bug?) , so don't bother with them (hence my only giving 3 stars)

This right here is a work of genius.  My only wish is for an undo button, for when you accidentally touch a part of the screen and it places a spot/cut/bridge in an unwinnable spot.  Especially annoying during daily challenge that you can't re-do.  Also, I would like to be able to retry any level, such as the daily or randoms, even if it wouldn't "count". I'm convinced every so often there is an unwinable level, but you can't even test it or let the devs know because once you fail it goes away permanently.  Still, a great, great game... I really hope there is a V2 some day.

descriptionHTML:
Lines – Physics Drawing Puzzle is a new Zen puzzle published by the creators of Puzzlerama and Mazes & More. Challenge your brain, draw, cut and erase to find the solution to the 250+ smart levels. Relax, unwind and let the color flow into the labyrinth of lines, in a Zen experience that will let your mind flow free and antistress. Some levels have a perfect symmetry, other are a maze of lines. Can you master all of them? No pencil needed!
How to play Lines – Physics Drawing Puzzle
Depending on the level, you will need to tap to place a dot over a line, erase and opponent´s dot, cut or draw lines. Then watch the colors unfold and flow!

Lines – Physics Drawing Puzzle key features include:
- 5 different modes: Point, Erase, Cut, Draw and Mix
- Daily Challenges
- 26 achievements to unlock
-250 smart levels
- Use your brain and logics to find the solutions
- Bronze, Silver and Gold medals for each level.
- Infinite fun!

Point Mode
Tap over a line to place a dot. Be smart and choose and strategic and logic position for the dots. Sometimes you need to place one, other two dots.

Eraser Mode
Tap over an opponent´s dot to erase it.

Draw Mode
Draw a line with your fingers to connect lines to your advantage. Use your brain!

Cut Mode
Cut a line to stop the flow of your opponent´s color.

Hope you all guys enjoy Lines – Physics Drawing Puzzle! Created by our Dutch friends from Gamious!

comments: The graphic are great and the gameplay is fun but what kept me going was the writing. At first I was like uhhh another newspaper? Those don't do anything... But I kept reading and they are GREAT. On the lower side, the drones often clip in building and can't be clicked or you click straight on it but get sent to a building screen instead and by the time you get back, the fast drones are gone.

I play the game all the time, but it needs easier and faster prestige. Three days of waiting for the next egg is bs with a prestige score of almost 1,000,000. Also "silos" hardly earn anything. That's my main complaint. Fix it so they earn WAY more over non play or I'm done and I've actually spent money so if you still want that, fix it.

Fun and simple game that lets you gradually grow your farm at your own speed. This is a game you can play from once a week where you collect the money you've collected offline, buy upgrades, then leave the game for another week; to spending a few casual hours of hunting for the drones that give you extra money and gold eggs which are the games micro-transaction currency to buy permanent upgrades that help your farm grow faster. It not so much a race as it is just enjoying your farm steadily grow over time.

Edit: Latest update is thoroughly average. Some great new tools and really cool upgrades mixed in with ridiculously boring time sink achievements. They breathed new life into the game and then stuffed it up and made me sit around for 20 actual real life days for each egg waiting for a chicken counter to reach a billion. Such a shame.  I like big numbers and Egg Inc. delivers in spades. Click and hold functionality, strategic planning and approachable mission targets; one of the best in the genre.

My only complaint is when is that everything you tap opens a menu. So if you were to try to hit a drone and accidentally tap the housing it opens that menu and you can't close it fast enough to still get the drone. I think there should just be a single or couple small menu buttons that allow you to cycle through the different things you can purchase to avoid this. Other than that great game! It's entertaining to have 100 million chickens in your pocket.

Been playing this game for a while now, but something awesome happened. I completed a quest which took about 4 days to manage, but I only completed it about an hour before the deadline. It didn't register, and when I looked it said I haven't completed the quest and it's expired. Today I got a popup saying sorry about that, and giving me the rewards for it, so thanks!! What a game and what great developers you are!
description: In the near future, the secrets of the universe will be unlocked in the chicken egg. You have decided to get in on the gold rush and sell as many eggs as you can. Hatch chickens, build hen houses, hire drivers, and commission research to build the most advanced egg farm in the world.An incremental (clicker) game at its core, Egg, Inc. uses many elements from simulation games that give it a unique feel and play style. Instead of menus, you are presented with crisp and colorful 3D graphics and a delightful simulation of a swarm of chickens. In addition to choosing your investments wisely you must also balance your resources to ensure a smooth running and efficient egg farm.There is something for everyone here:Casual players love Egg Inc's laid back feel and beautiful appearance. Take your time to build a wonderful egg farm and explore all the content.More experienced incremental (clicker) players will love the emergent gameplay and depth afforded by the different play styles needed throughout the game. To reach the ultimate goal of having a ginormous egg farm with an astronomical value, you will need to balance strategies throughout many prestiges to make best use of your time.Features- Simple, Casual gameplay with opportunities to challenge yourself- Chicken swarm!- Dozens of research items- Dozens of missions- Many different hen houses and shipping vehicles- A "Nested" Prestige system has the game always feeling new- Wonderful 3d graphics with pixel perfect UI and shadows- Google Play Games Achievements, Leaderboards & Quests!
descriptionHTML:
In the near future, the secrets of the universe will be unlocked in the chicken egg. You have decided to get in on the gold rush and sell as many eggs as you can.

Hatch chickens, build hen houses, hire drivers, and commission research to build the most advanced egg farm in the world.

An incremental (clicker) game at its core, Egg, Inc. uses many elements from simulation games that give it a unique feel and play style. Instead of menus, you are presented with crisp and colorful 3D graphics and a delightful simulation of a swarm of chickens. In addition to choosing your investments wisely you must also balance your resources to ensure a smooth running and efficient egg farm.

There is something for everyone here:
Casual players love Egg Inc's laid back feel and beautiful appearance. Take your time to build a wonderful egg farm and explore all the content.

More experienced incremental (clicker) players will love the emergent gameplay and depth afforded by the different play styles needed throughout the game. To reach the ultimate goal of having a ginormous egg farm with an astronomical value, you will need to balance strategies throughout many prestiges to make best use of your time.

Features
- Simple, Casual gameplay with opportunities to challenge yourself
- Chicken swarm!
- Dozens of research items
- Dozens of missions
- Many different hen houses and shipping vehicles
- A "Nested" Prestige system has the game always feeling new
- Wonderful 3d graphics with pixel perfect UI and shadows
- Google Play Games Achievements, Leaderboards & Quests!

summary: Build an enormous egg farm!
title: Egg, Inc.

comments: So far so good. I don't expect to Win all the time and I am making progress at this point. The graphics are great and the heat factor are much less than other games with lesser graphics. I am liking the game play so far. I only installed it last night and started playing this morning so it's still early day's. I will be going into it with an open mind. Most mobile games are rigged to get you to spend money. What happened to the day's when you could play a demo and if youike a game you buy it? No adds no pay to win. I will play it till it gets to much.

Awesome game. Hours of fun. My only grumble is the matchmaking. It should go not only by infamy, but with ship levels as well. You can't compete against a ship 2 lvl above you  also, you shouldn't be matched against friends and guild mates. Other than that, awesome game!

Need high end phone to play this game. Not optimised for middle range device. And the ping is insane. Add more servers. What's with new aim assist! Just remove it.  This is a very unique and awesome game. But you guys need to fix it.

Thanks for adding new boxes daily! I would really like to get all items I missed Please I'm a new player and missed since March 1 please help me get my missed items! Make it possible! Because noting is impossible! In your hands.

The whole game is more or less deliberately unbalanced to encourage you to spend money and holy cow things are expensive. Little one time upgrades cost $50. The idea is good, the greed really killed the idea.

This was a great game until the last update. The patch won't install and after trying a multitude of fixes the game itself won't install. I even reset my phone to try and get this working with no success.

descriptionHTML:
Face off against real opponents and own the waves in real-time team battles – it’s sink or win.

A real-time multiplayer battle arena in your pocket. Choose a ship, slap some guns on it and take to the tides with your fleet of teammates to trounce live opponents in five-on-five contests of seafaring strategy and firepower.

Mobile MOBA
The thrilling competition of a team battle arena right on your mobile device. Join a fleet of allies and take on competitors the world over in bite-sized battles among the rolling waves – all while you wait for the bus.

Choose A Ship
Choose between different classes of ships, each with their own speciality – the Enforcer packs a powerful offensive punch, the Defender is a nearly indestructible floating tank, the Shooter can equip more weapons than you will ever need, the Speeder is… speedy, and the Fixer keeps your teammates floating. Level up your ships for more healing, defense, speed, and firepower!

Weapons, Armor, Items, Abilities
Cannons, torpedoes, grenades – Collect, fuse and modify items to almost infinite variations. Choose from an arsenal of destructive or defensive items to fit your fighting style. Whatever it takes to keep you and your team stay afloat.

Get Strategic
Attack your enemies with a full on offensive assault, or play defense and capture the point. With different classes of ships to choose – each with their own unique abilities, and a motherload of weapons, armor, items, and perks, there is plenty of room for a wide range of battle strategies.

Join a Guild
Team up with your friends in a guild and chat with your guildmates while you send your opponents to the depths. Guild leaderboards pit your crew against other bands of blast-happy captains. Who will rise to the top?

comments: Hello. I enjoy the game, I finished the story mode and I'm doing pretty well. There are a few issues though. The daily challenge you can get against Octavo (the robot?) Is the same as the one against Alyx, despite a different description. And some of the words need to be reviewed more thoroughly. I'm fairly certain "yellowishnesses" and "f**ckoff" aren't words, among others. If you could look into these, that would be great. Thanks! Cheers!

I liked the game but it didn't have many words. I mean it said Abdominal üòë wasn't a real word, neither did it say antidisestablishmentarianism ü§ì was a word. I had to write it like 5 times üôÑ since the timer kept going up but when I finally did üòèis said it's not a real word üò≤ so I took a screenshot of it to check if I spelt it right and I did. üòé Other then that it's a wonderful game üòÑ

As enjoyable as expected. Needs to have an export or share words or list at the end of each round, to quick look up (send to dictionary app) new, unknown word definitions  -if it wants to be true word learning program. Features currently are more  han sufficient for spelling, Is there also a relaxed time mode? A bit buggy with relocation of caret and backspace deletes forward but once you get used to the fast tapping required, you fly through the levels. Or indeed, the retries of level.

The game is fun, varied, challenging but chill. It would be perfect, except that the Night Sky ad crashes the app every time. The other ads are fine (I mean, I don't like them, but they don't mess with the functionality of the app). It's just The Night Sky. Super annoying. If it keeps happening I'll have to find a new game that runs properly.

I love this game, for both it's smoothness when interacting with other players, and for the inherent challenge created by the random selection. If your vocabulary is humongous, or you're just looking to waste some time, or you are practicing you spelling, this game is fantastic for you. Add the fact that you can invite, and play with, friends, and you have a smash hit. To top it off, if you have a valid word, but the game didn't recognize it, you can send it to the developer to be added! Two thumbs up, all the way.

I loved being able to play against my friends, but now it tells me no server connection found and I can't play any games on there against my friends. 8 can receive requests to play, but it won't connect me and let me play. That just started happening and I've had no issues before. Please fix this! Very frustrating and annoying!!
description: Confident in the size of your vocabulary? Show it off in this new word-based battle game! Play through Story Mode and try your best to outsmart one of the 6 word champions the game presents you with. With 8 stages for each opponent, you‚Äôre all set for hours of fun! Each stage has its own set of rules that you must follow in order to win, so be prepared for some tricky levels.It isn‚Äôt as easy as it sounds though, because you can‚Äôt just send in random words. Every word you use has to start with the same letter that the previous word ended with, and on some levels specific letters are banned. But don‚Äôt worry! If you‚Äôre at a loss for a word that fits the criteria established for you, just use the Auto Complete feature for some suggestions. And if you ever run out of Auto Completes, you can buy them through an in-game purchase!If playing against the computer isn‚Äôt your thing, try your hand at the Multiplayer Mode. Just login to your Facebook account with the app on your phone or tablet and it will save your progress and let you challenge friends to a game of Battle Text. And if none of your friends are playing just yet, you can use the Quick Match feature to play against a random opponent!FEATURES:6 unique personalities to compete against48 different levels to play through in Story ModeMultiplayer Mode! Play with friends or strangers!Social media connection so you can keep your progressIn-game purchases to get more Auto-Completes and remove ads
descriptionHTML:
Confident in the size of your vocabulary? Show it off in this new word-based battle game!

Play through Story Mode and try your best to outsmart one of the 6 word champions the game presents you with. With 8 stages for each opponent, you’re all set for hours of fun! Each stage has its own set of rules that you must follow in order to win, so be prepared for some tricky levels.

It isn’t as easy as it sounds though, because you can’t just send in random words. Every word you use has to start with the same letter that the previous word ended with, and on some levels specific letters are banned. But don’t worry! If you’re at a loss for a word that fits the criteria established for you, just use the Auto Complete feature for some suggestions. And if you ever run out of Auto Completes, you can buy them through an in-game purchase!
If playing against the computer isn’t your thing, try your hand at the Multiplayer Mode. Just login to your Facebook account with the app on your phone or tablet and it will save your progress and let you challenge friends to a game of Battle Text. And if none of your friends are playing just yet, you can use the Quick Match feature to play against a random opponent!

FEATURES:
6 unique personalities to compete against
48 different levels to play through in Story Mode
Multiplayer Mode! Play with friends or strangers!
Social media connection so you can keep your progress
In-game purchases to get more Auto-Completes and remove ads

450 Century Park South
Suite 105-A
Birmingham, AL 35226
summary: Battle through 48+ word puzzles using your vocabulary as your weapon!
title: BattleText

description: After the success of Cheeseburger factory, bhelpuri maker, and Italian food factory frolicfox proudly presents Potato Chips factory for those who love playing cooking and food making games.Potato chips are the most favorite and easily cooked snacks loved by kids and star chef. The great chef makes easy snack right in the microwave and on the stove!Making Homestyle potato chips masala in your own kitchen is fun and easy. Experiment with the thickness; you may like them thicker or thinner. You can use best ingredients to cook potato chips with low fats, like olive oil, safflower, corn, or peanut oil as well as vegetable oil.Potato chips masalas factory game trained you in a way so that you will be able to save a lot of hard-earned cash with less effort. Stop paying too much for the packed chips, instead try out at your own potato chips factory and prove yourself a master chef. Learn how easy it is to make your own homemade potato chips with an easy-to-follow recipe with photos of each step. The hardest part of potato chips cooking is cutting them thin which is easy in our factory with modern cutters and utensils. Enjoy potato chips maker and cooking game on your smartphone and enjoy yourself as a crazy chef.  How to Cook The recipe for cooking potato is very simple and saves a lot of time. You just need to follow the following easy steps. First of all to cook potato chips turn your deep fryer on high. Fill it up about halfway with cooking oil. Wash potatoes, Remove the chaff, sliced the potatoes with the cutting tools available in the factory. Boil the oil mixture and add sliced potatoes in it.  Add the chips to finish off and crisp up. After lifting them from the oil and letting them drain and cool, carefully take them out and put the chips on a plate. Add spices, black pepper, slats, and flavors to make it more delicious. After finish cooking gathers all the chips and starts packing. Pack the chips in colored wrappers and deliver them to the shop. Potato chips factory is a crazy cooking and food maker game for kids, little girls, and boys who love cooking.

descriptionHTML:
Quick, simple and easy, Yahtzee is an fun game that will challenge you plenty, and encourage you to try just one more game.

Roll it to the limit for the ultimate win with the Yahtzee Classic game. Now with a casino- cool dice, you're ready to roll!

Yahtzee is a dice game, which was first marketed as "Yatzie" in the early 1940s.

Yatzie was included in a game set called "LUCK - 15 Grand Dice Games".

Dice games, by their very nature, tend to rely much more on luck than skill. But playing the odds and calculating probabilities are definitely skills that can help you win the game Yatzy.

The objective of the game is to score high points by rolling five dice to make certain combinations.

Yahtzee is played with five dice. The dice can be rolled up to three times in a turn to try to make one of the thirteen possible scoring combinations. A game consists of thirteen rounds during which the player chooses which scoring combination is to be used in that round. Once a combination has been used in the game, it cannot be used again.

Do the best dice combination in the this multiplayer Yahtzee game. Half of the fun of this game is to yell out the game's name if and when you roll one. A Yatzy occurs when a player rolls and all five dice are the same number.

Special Yahtzee rule is, the first time you get a Yahtzee in a game it is worth 50 points (if you use it in the yahtzee slot). If you roll another Yahtzy after you have already got the 50 points (i.e., you didn’t take a zero), you will get a 100 point bonus.

The Yahtzee scorecard contains 13 scoring boxes divided between two sections:
1) Upper section
2) Lower section

Now play with your Facebook friends and with millions of Yahtzy players around the world.

You can also create Private Rooms and invite your friends to play.

Unique combination of luck and strategy makes every game of yahtzee an exciting challenge.

Dice games are not only simple, but actually a lot of fun, regardless of whether you’re a child or an adult.

If you're looking for some quick, light fun then yahtzee is the game for you.

Download it for free today and have hours of fun.

 ◆◆◆◆ Yahtzee Features◆◆◆◆

✔ Fast-paced, competitive and fun - for free!
✔ Play with Facebook Friends or as Guest
✔ Create Private Room and Invite Friends and Family
✔ Play with players across the world

Any suggestions? We always love to hear from you for making this game better.

Enjoy playing Yahtzee!!

Please don't forget to Rate and Review Yahtzee, we aim to make it one of the best board games out there
